Investigating height in relation to number of live births

```{r setup}
library(TwoSampleMR)
```

## Sitting height

```{r }
d <- make_dat("ukb-b-16881", "ukb-b-1209")
d_mr<-mr(d)
d_mr
mr_scatter_plot(d_mr,d)
```

```{r }

d_mr

```
